attributes.action: seek the amendment of the Commonwealth War Graves Commission royal charter to enable those sevicemen and women killed on active service in conflicts post 1945 to be honoured with a war graves headstone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All military personnel who have made the ultimate sacrifice in the service of this country should be honoured in the same way as the fallen of the two world wars.
